title: Nikon D40 DVD Guide - Magic Lantern
description:
NIKON D40 & D40X DVD GUIDE- MAGIC LANTERN

Take full advantage of your camera&#039;s impressive features with this authoritative DVD guide. The experts at Magic Lantern go beyond the owner&#039;s manual to show you how to get great pictures.
Created by photographers for photographers, this over eighty-minute DVD is like having a one-on-one workshop with a Nikon D40 or D40X expert right in your own home! You can learn at your own pace and easily navigate between topics and chapters at anytime. Whether this is your first digital SLR or you are an experienced digital photographer, soon you&#039;ll be taking great pictures and expanding your creative boundaries.

You&#039;ll learn all about:
Features & Controls
Image Quality & Formats
Playback & Editing
Menu Navigation & Custom Settings
Getting Exposure & White Balance Right
Flash Photography

PLEASE SEED THIS TORRENT!
